originalText.text: It was a pleasant surprise when I used the services of A1 Towing NYC for a tire repair. It was the first time for me using a towing service, and I was nervous. But the team at A1 quickly put my worries to rest. From the moment of my call, the customer service was excellent. The technician was on-time and had the tools needed to perform the job. The experience went smoothly from the arrival of the truck to the completed repair. I am very pleased with the quality of their work and the professionalism of their staff. They will definitely be my go-to service for future tow and tire repair services.

originalText.text: A1 Towing NYC is the best choice for fuel delivery. Last week I was driving cross-country when my vehicle ran out of gas. I was stranded in the middle of nowhere with no options for getting fuel. I called them and within minutes they were there, ready to help. They quickly delivered fuel to my car and got me on my way. It was a positive experience and I highly recommend them for all of your fuel delivery needs.

originalText.text:
I would give these losers a 0 star if I could.  Stay far away. Do not use them. I needed roadside assistance I waited 2hours and 20 minutes. finally I was frustrated so I called them.  They then said there was no work order for my vehicle and rudely hung up.   My insurance company reached out to me telling me that they where still charging for a tow that never happened.  Also telling my insurance company that I canceled when they clearly never showed up.

Worst company.  So unprofessional.

originalText.text: They’ll most likely hide this review. Joke of a company. been sitting on the side of the road for 2 hours for the driver to call me sounding high of his head, to tell me to drive my indriveable car off the highway. After accepting the contract from AAA to pick up a car on the highway. If you’re not comfortable picking up on the highway maybe find a new job. Not even worth the one star.
